page.title: 16GAMES WE PLAY IN SETTLE (2)
page.content: {HOPSCOTCH:}We play Hopscotch in the little playground.One or more can play.You have to have a stone.The hopscotch grid is laid out like this: First you try to throw your 1 stone onto no.1 then you hop 2 3 on the single squares and 4 jump with both feet on the 5 6 double squares.Every time 7 you throw your stone you 8 9 throw it onto the next number 10 and jump or hop over it.you take it in turns to hop down the grid and when you have jumped over the stone you pick it up and when you finish you give it to the next person.{OFF GROUND {TIG:}Someone is on and anything off ground is den.If you are on the ground you can be tug and then you are on.{ {HIDE AND SEEK:}Someone is on and the rest go to hide.When you are ready the first person you find is on.
